executable.title: Expanded Granular Feature Extraction
executable.description: Run and Test Expanded Granular Features
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of efforts in digital pathology by the Sarder Lab: UFL.

string-enumeration.name: type
string-enumeration.label: Job Type
string-enumeration.description: Type of Job: "Feature Pipeline" or "Test Run"

integer.name: threshold_nuclei
integer.label: Threshold for Nuclei
integer.description: Pixel intensity threshold for nuclear subcompartment

integer.name: threshold_PAS
integer.label: Threshold for PAS
integer.description: Pixel intensity for PAS subcompartment (if a pixel does not already belong to the nuclei subcompartment)

integer.name: threshold_LS
integer.label: Threshold for Luminal Space
integer.description: Pixel intensity for Luminal Space subcompartment (if a pixel does not already belong to either the nuclei or PAS subcompartment)

integer.name: minsize_LS
integer.label: Mininum Size Luminal Space
integer.description: Minimum size for Luminal Space objects

parameters.label: Girder API URL and Key
parameters.description: A Girder API URL and token for Girder client

string.name: girderToken
string.label: Girder API Token
string.description: A Girder token identifying a user session

string.name: ignoreAnns
string.label: Ignore Annotations (test run only)
string.description: Specify annotation names to ignore (spots and interstitium are automatically skipped, comma separated list)

boolean.name: rename
boolean.label: Rename structures
boolean.description: Whether or not to rename structures to nicer names

boolean.name: returnXlsx
boolean.label: Return Excel File(s) (test run only)
boolean.description: Whether or not to output excel files containing morphometric features (must also specify path)

boolean.name: replace_annotations
boolean.label: Annotations with Feature Data
boolean.description: Replace current annotations with copies that contain feature values as metadata.
